metadata.title: CVE-2014-7275 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The POP3-over-SSL implementation in getmail 4.0.0 through 4.44.0 does notverify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middleattackers to spoof POP3 servers and obtain sensitive information via acrafted certificate.

criterions.comment: getmail4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
